import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Handle user login."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/auth/login"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Authenticates the user with email and password, then either issues
access and refresh tokens (if MFA is not enabled) or returns a
partial token requiring MFA verification.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

>
  
</RequestSchema>

  {...require("./login-handler.StatusCodes.json")}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
